text: "Healing Hands" is a 1989 song by Elton John. It was taken from his 22nd studio album Sleeping with the Past. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in the United States, number 6 in Canada, number 2 in Zimbabwe, number 14 in Australia, number 13 in Switzerland and number 10 in Austria. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Elton John songs
title: Healing Hands (Elton John song)
